meanings.definition: A hole through which oil is added or drained in a machine or engine.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic poured oil into the oilhole of the engine.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to regularly check and clean the oilhole in the machine.
meanings.sent3: When the oilhole got clogged, the machine started making strange noises.
meanings.sent4: The oilhole was like a gateway to keep the engine running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The oilhole gleamed in the sunlight, beckoning for maintenance.

meanings.definition: A hole in a piece of machinery or equipment for lubricating purposes.
meanings.sent1: The oilhole on the gear needed to be greased for proper functioning.
meanings.sent2: The technician used a special tool to access the oilhole in the equipment.
meanings.sent3: As the oilhole was lubricated, the machine hummed contentedly.
meanings.sent4: The oilhole was like a secret passage to keep the parts moving smoothly.
meanings.sent5: A drop of oil slid down the oilhole, ensuring everything worked perfectly.
